tool_description: GST Return Filing Status for India

api_list.name: /gstin
api_list.description: Retrieve details about a specific GSTIN (Goods and Services Tax Identification Number), including the latest return filing list, GST compliance classification, and HSN/SAC codes.

required_parameters.name: gstin
required_parameters.description: The GSTIN for which details are to be fetched.

optional_parameters.name: Content-Type
optional_parameters.description: The content type of the request.
